channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13008] WebHcat DDL commands in secure mode NPE when default FileSystem doesn't support delegation tokens
item.description:

item.summary: WebHcat DDL commands in secure mode NPE when default FileSystem doesn't support delegation tokens

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: thejas could you review please
+1 (non-binding), pending pre-commit run. This is the right thing to do from the perspective of integration with HDFS Federation and use of ViewFs as an abstraction over multiple file systems.

+1 LGTM

Thanks for your guidance and review cnauroth!
